actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain areas in the Flushing Meadows-Corona Park, located in the city of New York, shall become part of the Gateway National Recreation Area.

summary.text: Revises the boundaries of Gateway National Recreation Area, New York and New Jersey, to include specified sections of the Flushing Meadows-Corona Park. Permits the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands owned by the State of New York within the revised boundaries by purchase or exchange as well as by donation. Directs the Secretary of Commerce to transfer the United States pavilion of the 1964 World's Fair to the administative jurisdiction of the Secretary of the Interior for administration as part of the recreation area.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain areas in the Flushing Meadows-Corona Park, located in the city of New York, shall become part of the Gateway National Recreation Area.
